coherence_artifact.question: Does guided scheduling improve coherence compared to unguided in the Helmholtz toy?
coherence_artifact.answer: Guided runs show a positive ΔΨ curve relative to unguided across early steps; see summary_by_step.csv and the UCC comparator output.

sections.assumptions: Toy system; proxies only; not a physics claim.
sections.limitations: Small toy; drift metric is token-based; not semantic truth.
sections.uncertainty: Results depend on chosen seeds and step caps.
sections.disclosure: Research scaffold; not operational advice. Report issues via repo.
